[i]Adept[/i] – Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may pay {2}. If you do, copy it. You may choose new modes and new targets for the copy.
[i]Flare [/i]– Whenever an opponent loses life during your turn, you gain that much life.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {2}{G}{U}{B} [i](You may put this card over another Soren creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)[/i]
